00019 #ifndef FINDISO_H
00020 #define FINDISO_H
00021 
00022 
00023 #include "graph.h"
00024 #include "fixpoint.h"
00025 #include "label.h"
00026 #include "mapping.h"
00027 
00028 // class used to find all the isomorphism between two graphs
00029 class findIso {
00030         public :
00031         // constructor
00032         // tg1 and tg2, the two graphs to match
00033         // tdMax, the maximum distance to use for IDL filtering
00034         // tsol, a vector of solutions
00035         // tnbMaxSol : the maximum number of solutions to find
00036         findIso(Graph * tg1, Graph * tg2, int tdMax, mapping ** tsol=NULL, int tnbMaxSol=1,bool hashing=true) {
00037                 g1=tg1; g2=tg2;
00038                 dMax=tdMax;nbMaxSol = tnbMaxSol;
00039                 sol =tsol;
00040                 nbFoundedSol = 0;
00041                 
00042                 // initial labelling functions
00043                 l1 = new Label(g1);
00044                 l2 = new Label(g2);
00045                 
00046                 fp = new fixPointTwoGraphs(g1,g2,dMax,hashing);
00047                 m = new mapping(g1,g2);
00048         }
00049         
00050         // to call before running
00051         void init(void) {
00052                 fp->init();
00053         }
00054         
00055         // execute the algorithm
00056         int run(void) {
00057                 l1->allTheSameLabel();
00058                 l2->allTheSameLabel();
00059                 int nbNodes = 0;
00060                 int res;
00061                 res =  recursion(nbNodes,0);
00062                 return nbFoundedSol;
00063         }
00064         
00065         
00066         // make the recursion on the search tree
00067         // nbNodes memorizes the number of developped nodes
00068         // depth is the depth in the tree when the function is called
00069         // return the number of solutions found
00070         int recursion(int & nbNodes, int depth) {
00071                 int nbL;
00072                 short v1,lv1;
00073                 short * v2;
00074                 short nbV2;
00075                 short i;
00076                 short * saveL1;
00077                 short * saveL2;
00078                 int res = 0;
00079                 nbNodes++;
00080                 // compute the fix point of the dMax-IDL consistency
00081                 nbL = fp->computeFixPoint(l1,l2);
00082                 
00083                 // if the labels does not match
00084                 if(nbL == -1) {
00085                         return 0;
00086                 }
00087                 
00088                 // if there is one label by vertex
00089                 if(nbL == g1->getOrder()) {
00090                         m->setFromLabels(l1,l2);
00091                         // if m is an isomorphism function
00092                         if(m->isAnIsoFunction()) {
00093                                 memorizeCurrentMapping();
00094                                 return 1;
00095                         } else { // m is not an isomorphism function
00096                                 return 0;
00097                         }
00098                 } else { // at least one label is used two times
00099                         // we find the first vertex v1 having a label lv1 used more than one time
00100                         v1 = 0;
00101                         while(l1->getFreq(l1->getLabel(v1)) == 1) v1++;
00102                         lv1 = l1->getLabel(v1);
00103                         
00104                         // we find the set of vertices of G2 having the label lv1
00105                         v2 = new short[l1->getFreq(lv1)];
00106                         nbV2 = 0;
00107                         for(i = 0 ; i < g2->getOrder() ; i++) {
00108                                 if(lv1 == l2->getLabel(i)) {
00109                                         v2[nbV2] = i;
00110                                         nbV2++;
00111                                 }
00112                         }
00113                         
00114                         // we save the labels
00115                         saveL1 = new short[g1->getOrder()];
00116                         saveL2 = new short[g2->getOrder()];
00117                         l1->store(saveL1);
00118                         l2->store(saveL2);
00119                         
00120                         // we give an unique label to v1 and v2 and we recurse
00121                         for(i = 0 ; i < nbV2 ; i++) {
00122                                 l1->changeLabel(v1,l1->getNbLabels());
00123                                 l2->changeLabel(v2[i],l2->getNbLabels());
00124                                 //cout << depth << " " << nbNodes << " " << v1 << " " << v2[i] << endl;
00125                                 res+=recursion(nbNodes,depth+1);
00126                                 if(nbFoundedSol >= nbMaxSol) {
00127                                         return res;
00128                                 }
00129                                 l1->restore(saveL1);
00130                                 l2->restore(saveL2);
00131                         }
00132                         delete [] saveL1;
00133                         delete [] saveL2;
00134                         delete [] v2;
00135                 }
00136                 
00137                 // we return the number of solutions found
00138                 return res;
00139         }
00140         
00141         ~findIso(void) {
00142                 delete fp;
00143                 delete l1;
00144                 delete l2;
00145                 delete m;
00146         }
00147         
00148         protected :
00149         // ref to the two graphs
00150         Graph * g1;
00151         Graph * g2;
00152         
00153         // maximal distance
00154         short dMax;
00155         
00156         // the mapping used to control that we found an isomorphism
00157         mapping * m;
00158         
00159         // the current labelling functions
00160         Label * l1;
00161         Label * l2;
00162         
00163         // used to compute the ILL consistency
00164         fixPointTwoGraphs * fp;
00165         
00166         // ref to the vector of solution
00167         mapping ** sol;
00168         
00169         // number max of solutions to memorize
00170         short nbMaxSol;
00171         
00172         // number of solution found
00173         short nbFoundedSol;
00174         
00175         // memorize the current mapping m in sol
00176         void memorizeCurrentMapping(void) {
00177                 if(nbFoundedSol < nbMaxSol) {
00178                         sol[nbFoundedSol] = new mapping(m);
00179                 }
00180                 nbFoundedSol++;
00181         }
00182 };
00183 
00184 
00185 #endif
